imdb.title: Bleach: Burîchi
imdb.plot: High school student Ichigo Kurosaki, who has the ability to see ghosts, gains soul reaper powers from Rukia Kuchiki and sets out to save the world from "Hollows".

episodes.title: OVA: Memories in the Rain
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Jump Festa Anime Tour 2004 - Gotei 13 Omake
episodes.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Bleach Colorful!: Gotei Juusan Yatai Daisakusen!
episodes.plot: Included in BLEACH 5th Anniversary BOX Bonus DVD, this is an animated adaptation of "Tedious Everyday Tales Colorful Bleach".

episodes.title: 3rd Year High School Student! Dressed Up, and a New Chapter Begins!
episodes.plot: Seventeen months after losing his powers, Ichigo is living a normal high school life without being able to see ghosts anymore.

episodes.title: A Dispute in School?! Ichigo and Uryu, Fight Together!
episodes.plot: Ichigo gets contacted by a man named Kugo Ginjoo who wants information about a certain person close to Ichigo. Uryu pursues a stranger who appears to be interested in Ichigo.

episodes.title: Uryu Is Attacked! A Threat Draws Near the Friends!
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Orihime visit Uryu in the hospital. Ichigo then finds out that the mysterious attacker seems to be after others too.

episodes.title: The Man with the Fullbring Ability: Kugo Ginjo
episodes.plot: Unable to bear seeing his friends get attacked, Ichigo decides to call on Ginjo for some answers. At his hideout, "Xcution," Ginjo tells Ichigo of his goal to restore Ichigo's lost Soul Reaper powers, as well as demonstrating his own unique power, "Fullbring."

episodes.title: A Crisis Sneaking Up on the Kurosaki Family?! Ichigo's Confusion!
episodes.plot: Ginjo gives Ichigo a day to decide whether to regain his lost Soul Reaper powers or not. But Ichigo, who no longer wishes to endanger anyone by being a Soul Reaper, decides to decline the offer.

episodes.title: Power of the Substitute Badge, Ichigo's 'Pride'!
episodes.plot: Ichigo begins training to regain his Soul Reaper powers at the Xcution's hideout. His first training is to fight and win against Mr. Pork, an opponent created by Riruka's Fullbring power "Dollhouse."

episodes.title: Next Target! The Devil's Hand Aims at Orihime!
episodes.plot: On her way home from school, Orihime is suddenly stopped and asked to die by a man named Shishigawara. Confused at first, Orihime quickly realizes that Shishigawara may be related to Uryu's attacker, and prepares to fight.

episodes.title: The Man Who Killed the Shinigami Substitute?! Tsukishima Makes His Move
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Chad rush to find Orihime, who they believe may be in danger. Meanwhile, Orihime attempts to stop Tsukishima from leaving the scene, but is instead stabbed by his Fullbring power, "Book of The End."

episodes.title: Fullbring! The Detested Power!
episodes.plot: Ichigo asks Ginjo to let him fight one of the Xcution members for his training. But Jackie, who detests the power of Fullbring, finds Ichigo's request selfish and refuses. Meanwhile, danger closes in on Chad.

episodes.title: Tsukishima Attacks! The Training Has Been Thwarted
episodes.plot: Ichigo begins his training with Jackie Tristan, who brings out her Fullbring power "Dirty Boots." As he goes up against Jackie's powerful attacks, Ichigo begins to gradually understand the use of his own Fullbring power.

episodes.title: Ichigo, Mastering the Fullbring!
episodes.plot: Tsukishima breaks into the Xcution hideout where Ichigo is training. Learning that he was the one who attacked Uryu and Orihime, a furious Ichigo proceeds to attack Tsukishima. But with his Fullbring power still incomplete, Ichigo finds himself gradually overpowered by his opponent.

episodes.title: Ichigo vs. Ginjo! To the Game's Space
episodes.plot: Uryu asks Orihime to heal his injuries after sensing that his assailant has now made contact with Ichigo. Meanwhile, Ichigo enters his training with Ginjo inside Yukio's Fullbring power "Invaders Must Die."

episodes.title: Shinigami at War! New Year in Seireitei Special!
episodes.plot: On New Year's Day, Izuru hosts a kite-flying contest in the hopes of everyone having a good time. Meanwhile, Rukia is practicing a dance she will perform for the New Year's Celebration Ceremony but cannot seem to get the steps right.

episodes.title: Friend or Foe?! Ginjo's True Intentions!
episodes.plot: Ichigo, with Orihime standing by as his healer, enters his training with Ginjo.

episodes.title: Tsukishima's Ability, the Danger Is Drawing Near!
episodes.plot: Orihime and Chad exchange what information they have about Tsukishima to figure out what he has done to the both of them.

episodes.title: Clash!? Xcution Attacks Ginjo
episodes.plot: Uryu begins his own investigation to track down the enemy who attacked him. As he goes around searching for clues, he notices that people close to Ichigo are acting strangely. Meanwhile, Ichigo's Fullbring training is nearing its completion.

episodes.title: The Sorrowful Battle! Ichigo vs. Sado & Orihime
episodes.plot: Ichigo escapes from his house in confusion after witnessing his friends and family welcoming Tsukishima as if they've known him for years. Regrouping with Ginjo, Ichigo learns that the same change has also happened to Riruka and the other Xcution members.

episodes.title: Ichigo vs Uryu?! Who is the Traitor?!
episodes.plot: Ichigo is shocked to learn that Chad and Orihime have now sided with Tsukishima and are even willing to fight Ichigo to protect their precious "friend." Meanwhile, Ginjo races to help Ichigo, but the remaining members of Xcution halt his attempt.

episodes.title: A New Appearance! The Gotei 13, Arrives!
episodes.plot: Ginjo reveals his true colors by attacking Ichigo and stripping him of his Fullbring powers. Ichigo lies in despair from losing his powers yet again, when his father Isshin and Kisuke Urahara arrive.

episodes.title: Revival! Substitute Shinigami: Ichigo Kurosaki!
episodes.plot: Under the orders of Head Captain Yamamoto, the 13 Court Guard Squad Soul Reapers share their Spirit Energy to restore Ichigo's lost powers. With his Soul Reaper powers fully restored, Ichigo returns to challenge Ginjo.

episodes.title: Fierce Fight! Shinigami vs. XCUTION!
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers take on the Xcution members in one-on-one battles. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Uryu prepare to take on Ginjo.

episodes.title: Desperate Struggle!? Byakuya's Troubled Memories
episodes.plot: The battle between Byakuya and Tsukishima escalates as they both push their powers to the limit. Meanwhile, Rukia struggles against the cute traps set up by Riruka.

episodes.title: Ichigo vs. Ginjo! Secret of the Substitute Badge
episodes.plot: While facing each other in battle, Uryu notices that Ginjo's attack contains the presence of Ichigo's Spirit Energy. Ignoring Uryu's warning, Ichigo fires his Getsugatensho attack, only to be countered by Ginjo's own Getsugatensho attack.

episodes.title: Changing History, Unchanging Heart
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Ginjo both release their Bankai to settle the score once and for all.

episodes.title: Unusual Incident in Seireitei?! Gotei 13 Invading Army Arc!
episodes.plot: Peace has seemingly returned to both the World of the Living and the Soul Society with Aizen's defeat. But reports of Soul Reapers going missing after entering the Precipice World begin to surface in the Soul Society. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Kon finds an unconscious girl lying in the street and brings her home to care for, while Ichigo and Rukia discover that they are unable to contact the Soul Society.

episodes.title: Renji vs. Rukia?! Battle with Comrades!
episodes.plot: Ichigo is placed under arrest by the Soul Society under suspicion of being responsible for the disappearance of the Soul Reapers in the Precipice World. With Rukia's help, the two make an escape, when Renji and Ikkaku appear to do battle.

episodes.title: Ichigo's Capture Net! Escape from Soul Society!
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Rukia find stored records on Nozomi at the Department of Research and Development, and realize the World of the Living is in danger. Hurrying to get back, the two regroup with Yoruichi, who proposes to get past the heavily guarded Senkaimon by force. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Kon and Nozomi find themselves attacked by Kira, Nanao, and a Soul Reaper calling himself Kageroza.

episodes.title: Gotei 13, Gathering in the Real World!
episodes.plot: The 13 Court Guard Squads who attacked Ichigo and Rukia in the Soul Society are revealed to be imposters known as Reigai, who have switched places with their originals. Thanks to the work of Mayuri, the real captains and lieutenants are rescued from the Precipice World, and they all regroup in the World of the Living to discuss how to deal with this new crisis. Meanwhile, to help Nozomi feel welcomed, Ichigo and the others decide to host a barbecue party, when Nozomi suddenly runs off.

episodes.title: Showdown of Mutual Self, Ikkaku vs. Ikkaku!
episodes.plot: Kon goes out to search for Nozomi and finds her wandering aimlessly. Meanwhile, the Soul Society has assembled a special team, including the Reigai of Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Hisagi, to apprehend Ichigo. The Reigai arrive in the World of the Living where they encounter their originals, and a battle ensues!

episodes.title: Clash! Rukia vs. Rukia!
episodes.plot: Rangiku faces the Reigai of Izuru, but the imposter's Zanpakuto proves to be more powerful then she anticipated. Rukia is also having a tough battle against the Reigai of herself and Nemu, when help arrives from an unexpected person. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, Ukitake pleads for Kyoraku's release to Central 46.

episodes.title: Protect Ichigo! Nozomi's Determination
episodes.plot: Chad encounters Renji's Reigai while searching for Nozomi, and a battle ensues between the two. Meanwhile, Unohana grows suspicious over the events surrounding Kyoraku's arrest, and begins to conduct her own research. In the process, Unohana learns that Kageroza is the mastermind behind this incident.

episodes.title: Recapture Seireitei! The Captains Move!
episodes.plot: The captains of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads take action to reclaim the Soul Society back from the Reigai. As they successfully reenter the Soul Society, Kenpachi encounters his Reigai, and a fierce battle ensues. Meanwhile, Genryusai battles the Reigai of Kyoraku and Ukitake but notices something odd about their movements.

episodes.title: For the Sake of the Believers! Byakuya vs. Hitsugaya!
episodes.plot: Moved by Ichigo and his friends' efforts to protect her, Nozomi decides to stay with the group and begins to use her powers to heal Ichigo. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, Byakuya faces the Reigai of Hitsugaya.

episodes.title: The Two Hinamori, Hitsugaya's Resolution
episodes.plot: Ichigo leaves for the Soul Society to join the battle, only to be ambushed by Kageroza, who intends to erase Ichigo's existence. Back in the Soul Society, the wounded captains find themselves facing new Reigais to battle, while Hitsugaya is reunited with Hinamori.

episodes.title: Pride of the Kuchiki Family! Byakuya vs. Byakuya!
episodes.plot: Captains of the 13 Court Guard Squads continue their battle to reclaim the Soul Society. Head Captain Yamamoto takes on the Reigai of Kyoraku and Ukitake, but is gradually overwhelmed by the two. Meanwhile in the World of the Living, Nozomi and the others learn of Ichigo's disappearance inside the Precipice World.

episodes.title: Defeat Kageroza! Shinigami, All-Out War!
episodes.plot: Captains Hitsugaya and Kenpachi have located Kageroza and proceed to attack him, but Kageroza retaliates by controlling the Precipice World to his advantage. Back in the World of the Living, Nozomi and the others continue their search for the missing Ichigo.

episodes.title: The Forbidden Research... Nozomi's Hidden Secret!
episodes.plot: Ichigo, who was swept away by the Cleaner inside the Precipice World, has safely returned to the World of the Living to everyone's delight. Meanwhile in the Soul Society, the Reigai are revealed to be Mod Souls created by Kageroza.

episodes.title: I Want to Live... Nozomi's Zanpakuto
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers in the World of the Living have lost contact with the captains in the Soul Society. Meanwhile, the revelation of Nozomi being a Mod Soul surprises Ichigo and his friends. Kon is particularly shocked, and is now unsure of how to interact with Nozomi.

episodes.title: For the Sake of Fighting! The Awakened Nozomi!
episodes.plot: Nozomi wishes to join the battle against the Reigai, believing her Zanpakuto may stand a chance against Kageroza's Zanpakuto. But the Soul Reapers are unable to completely trust Nozomi due to her power not being fully awakened yet. Ichigo and his friends decide to help Nozomi by training her to reach Shikai.

episodes.title: The Most Evil Reigai, Appears in the Real World!
episodes.plot: Having regained her Shikai, Nozomi tries to join Ichigo and the others to fight the Reigai captains, but the other Soul Reapers tell her not to interfere. In the midst of the battle, Hisagi and Izuru are brought down by the Reigai of Hitsugaya, who prepares to finish off the two lieutenants.

episodes.title: Destroy Nozomi?! Genrysai's Decision
episodes.plot: Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto steps in to battle against the Reigai. Ichigo and Nozomi join Genryusai, each taking on the Reigai of captains Unohana, Ukitake, and Kyoraku.

episodes.title: The Depleting Reiatsu! Ichigo, Death Struggle of the Soul!
episodes.plot: Nozomi's Zanpakuto breaks in the midst of trying to protect Genryusai from Kageroza's attack. As Ichigo and Kon try to save Nozomi from being taken away, Kageroza reveals a shocking secret between him and Nozomi.

episodes.title: Hiding in the Dangai? Another Ichigo?!
episodes.plot: Following his defeat by Kageroza, Ichigo has lost his Soul Reaper powers. Still determined to save Nozomi, Ichigo and his friends gather at Urahara's shop to come up with a rescue plan.

episodes.title: Pursue Kageroza! Technological Development Department, Infiltration!
episodes.plot: Inside the Precipice World, Rukia and the others act as decoys to draw away the Reigai's attention while Ichigo, Urahara, and Kon break into the Seireitei. As they search for Kageroza's laboratory, Urahara makes an attempt to restore Ichigo's lost Soul Reaper powers but is discovered by the Reigai of Nemu and Nanao.

episodes.title: The Developer of the Modified Souls
episodes.plot: The captains and lieutenants of the 13 Court Guard Squads thought to have fallen in battle returns to fight the Reigai. Meanwhile, Ichigo's spirit energy and Hollow powers continue to grow unstable, forcing him to rest for the time being.

episodes.title: Kon's Thoughts, Nozomi's Thoughts
episodes.plot: Inside the Maggot's Nest, Urahara and Kon find Ouko Yushima, the man behind Kageroza's invasion. Finding traces of Kageroza's blood nearby, the two follow the trail and finally discover Nozomi's whereabouts.

episodes.title: Protect Ichigo! The Bonds of Friends!
episodes.plot: Kageroza, having regained his complete powers, sets out to kill the Hollowfied Ichigo when Rukia, Uryu, Renji, Chad, and Orihime arrive to stop him.

episodes.title: Reigai vs. Original! The Fierce Fighting for Gambled Pride!
episodes.plot: The captains of the 13 Court Guard Squads find themselves gradually overpowered by the Reigai forces. Meanwhile, Rukia, Uryu, Renji, and Chad use their teamwork to fight Kageroza.

episodes.title: Invading Army Arc, Final Conclusion!
episodes.plot: An unexpected change comes over the Reigai as the Soul Reapers continue to fight them. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Kageroza have their final showdown.

episodes.title: Thank You
episodes.plot: Returning to the World of the Living, Ichigo spends his days hunting down Hollows with what little Spirit Energy he has left. However, knowing that Ichigo cannot continue this much longer, Rukia soon realizes the time of their parting is fast approaching.

episodes.title: Ichigo vs. Ulquiorra, Restart
episodes.plot: Ichigo Begins his second battle with Ulquiorra and Orihime desperately watches Ichigo.

episodes.title: Connected Hearts! The Left Fist of Certain Death
episodes.plot: Below the Fifth Tower, Sado and Renji battle it out with a giant Hollow. But then, the sandman Batticaloa arrives to the scene. Batticaloa's body is made of sand, so Sado and Renji have a hard time inflicting any damage on him. And Rukia, whose ice-snow Zanpakuto is the sole weapon that can contend with Batticaloa, is struggling in another battle against Rudobon. Meanwhile, Ichigo and Ulquiorra are still battling when Ichigo learns that Orihime has already been converted to Ulquiorra's side. Ichigo pretends it doesn't concern him, but he can't hide his distress.

episodes.title: Hatred and Jealousy, Orihime's Dilemma
episodes.plot: While Orihime is watching Ichigo and Ulquiorra's battle from the sidelines, Loly and Menoly appear before her. They learned that Orihime is no longer of any use to Aizen, and they want to seize this opportunity to defeat her. Orihime has no means to fight back, and she gets hurt left and right. When Ichigo notices this, he tries to go rescue her, but Ulquiorra keeps getting in his way, and he is unable to get anywhere near Orihime. Amidst the chaos, a new enemy breaks through the floor of the Fifth Tower and appears before Ichigo and the others. The new enemy is none ...

episodes.title: Ichigo and Uryu, Bonded Back to Back
episodes.plot: Uryu rushes to stop Yammy from attacking Orihime. Ichigo is surprised, but Uryu charges at Yammy without hesitation. Uryu notices that Ichigo, concerned about Orihime, was not using the power of his Hollowfication, and Uryu was trying to get the fight with Yammy over with as quickly as possible. However, Yammy's body is tough, and every attack from Ginreikojaku's arrow and Seeleschneider is repelled. Yammy triumphantly brings out a giant Cero on them. Just when they thought it couldn't get any worse...

episodes.title: Beginning of Despair... Ichigo, the Unreachable Blade
episodes.plot: Ichigo shows Ulquiorra the Hollow Mask he wanted to see and in return Ulquiorra shows him his Resurreccion.

episodes.title: Ichigo Dies! Orihime, the Cry of Sorrow!
episodes.plot: Orihime and Uryu arrive above the canopy to find the lifeless body of Ichigo. Orihime's attempts to heal him seem to have no effect but as she's begging him for help something happens to Ichigo.

episodes.title: Ichigo vs. Ulquiorra, Conclusion!
episodes.plot: Rukia, Renji, and Sado are battling Rudobon and the soldiers he created. But then, another enemy appears before them. It is Yammy, who fell off of the Fifth Tower. The three of them are surprised that Yammy has transformed into a giant. In the meantime, on top of the dome, a Hollowfied Ichigo is fighting Ulquiorra. When Uryu tries to stop Ichigo...

episodes.title: Fury of the Shark! Harribel's Release
episodes.plot: Rukia, Renji, and Sado struggle against the giant Yammy. However, when they see Yammy's tattoo of the number "10", they realize that he is weaker than the Espadas they've fought in the past. Each one of them tries to go after Yammy, but Yammy releases his sword, Ira , which overwhelms them. Meanwhile, in Karakura Town, the battle between the Soul Reapers and the Espada, led by Aizen, intensifies. Halibel attacks Hitsugaya, who achieves Bankai and counterattacks, but...

episodes.title: Hitsugaya, the Desperate Hyoten Hyakkaso!
episodes.plot: Hitsugaya is doing everything he can to counter Halibel's sword release, Tiburon. Halibel says she will win against Hitsugaya to avenge her FracciÃ³nes. She melts the ice with Hirviendo and drives Hitsugaya into a corner. Hitsugaya counters by turning Halibel's water attack into ice with his Zanpakuto, Hyorinmaru, but Halibel has other tricks up her sleeve...

episodes.title: The Approaching Breath of Death, the King Who Rules Over Death!
episodes.plot: While Hitsugaya and Halibel's battle looks to be coming to a close, Omaeda and Soi Fon fight against Barragan. Just when Soi Fon is about to attack Barragan, Soi Fon suddenly becomes sluggish. Soi Fon is baffled, and Barragan tells her that he has the power to age people. Barragan only has to will old age upon his opponent and touch that person for the opponent to immediately grow old and die. Soi Fon now understands the severity of this power, but she has already been touched by Barragan...

episodes.title: One Hit Kill, Soifon, Bankai!
episodes.plot: Kyoraku continues his battle against Starrk as Lieutanant Omaeda is fighting Baraggan to give his captain time to prepare her trump card.

episodes.title: Climax! Kyoraku vs. Starrk!
episodes.plot: Kyoraku and Stark are both fighting defensively in their battle. But Stark's expression changes when he spots Hitsugaya and Soi Fon's Bankai. Kyoraku leaves his haori with Ukitake to confront Stark. Stark calls Lilinette over, and tells everyone that the two of them used to be one person. Stark then releases ResurrecciÃ³n and takes on the form of Los Lobos. Kyoraku achieves Shikai and they continue to fight for real!

episodes.title: The Nightmare Returns... Revival of the Espada
episodes.plot: Kyoraku is in a pinch, and Ukitake, who had been watching the battle, steps in. Ukitake fires Cero at Stark, even though it is a technique that Soul Reapers shouldn't be able to use. Stark is surprised, but he quickly recovers from the shock and shoots something back at him. Then, all of a sudden, Garganta starts to open to reveal the creepy Wonderweiss and Fura. All of the Soul Reapers are exhausted from battling, and they are in no state to face a new opponent...

episodes.title: Hirako and Aizen... The Reunion of Fate!
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers find themselves in hot water against Fura and Wonderweiss when the Visoreds, led by Shinji Hirako, make their appearance. Used in Aizen's Hollowfication experiment 101 years ago, the Visoreds have since lived in hiding in the World of the Living. Believing that now is the time to defeat Aizen, the Visoreds have set foot on the battlefield. Recognizing familiar faces, both Visoreds and Soul Reapers exchange words with one another. Wonderweiss disrupts the scene by signaling Fura to release hordes of Menos...

episodes.title: Hisagi and Tosen, the Moment of Parting
episodes.plot: Hisagi joins Komamura to battle Tosen in hopes of bringing his former captain back to his senses. Meanwhile, the other Soul Reapers form an uneasy alliance with the Visoreds...

episodes.title: Crown of Lies, Barragan's Grudge
episodes.plot: Baraggan's past as the king of Hueco Mundo is revealed as he continues to fight Soi Fon and Hachigen.

episodes.title: Power of the Soul! Los Lobos, Attack!
episodes.plot: Stark shows no sign of getting serious in his battle against Love and Rose. Lilinette begins to mindlessly fire at the two Visoreds without Stark's permission. But her attacks prove to be ineffective against the two...

episodes.title: Starrk, the Lone Battle
episodes.plot: Stark splits his own soul and shapes it into packs of wolves and launches them against Love and Rose. Preparing to deliver the finishing blow, Stark is caught off guard by Shunsui, who suddenly appears out of Stark's shadow.

episodes.title: Chain of Sacrifice, Harribel's Past
episodes.plot: Las Noches. Long ago, Apache, at the time still an Adjucha-class Hollow, was hunted by other Hollows when Halibel saved her life. Apache soon joins Halibel's group consisting of Sun-Sun and Mila Rose.

episodes.title: The Hundred-Year Grudge! Hiyori's Revenge
episodes.plot: With the Espada gone, the Visoreds are now able to confront Aizen.

episodes.title: Ichigo's Return! Protect Karakura Town
episodes.plot: As Ichigo saves Rukia from getting killed by the giant 16-legged freak Arrancar, Yammy himself tells Ichigo that he's nothing like the other Espadas.

episodes.title: Side Story! Ichigo and the Magic Lamp
episodes.plot: Ichigo wakes up to find himself in the middle of a desert. Sitting next to a confused Ichigo are Uryu, Orihime, and Chad, all dressed in an Arabian style.

episodes.title: The Final Trump Card! Ichigo, Towards the Decisive Battle
episodes.plot: Kenpachi overcomes Yammy's monstrous size and tough exterior to land a clean blow against the Espada. Meanwhile, Ichigo uses Garganta to return to the World of the Living.

episodes.title: Byakuya vs. Kenpachi?! The Melee Commences
episodes.plot: As he holds a dying Hiyori, an enraged Hirako readies himself to confront Aizen in battle. Meanwhile, Hisagi and Komamura battle Tosen in a desperate attempt to bring their former ally back to his senses.

episodes.title: For the Sake of Justice?! The Man Who Deserted the Shinigami
episodes.plot: Komamura performs his Bankai, Kokujo Tengen Myo-oh, to subdue Tosen. However, Tosen has already deduced the weakness of Komamura's Bankai from years of working closely together.

episodes.title: Desperate Struggle with Aizen! Hirako, Shikai!
episodes.plot: As Shuhei impales his captain Kaname through his skull, it woke him up from the darkness but then Aizen kills him, leading Sajin to retaliate

episodes.title: All Out War! Aizen vs. Shinigami
episodes.plot: Ichigo has returned to the World of the Living to battle Aizen. After an unsuccessful first attack, Ichigo Hollowfies to deliver his Getsugatensho against Aizen, but that too proves ineffective.

episodes.title: Hitsugaya, Enraged! Blade of Hatred!
episodes.plot: The Thirteen Court Guard Squads and Visoreds launch a full-scale attack against Aizen. But Aizen makes quick work of their combined efforts.

episodes.title: Impossible to Attack? The Sealed Genryusai!
episodes.plot: Genryusai Yamamoto joins the battle but Aizen has planned a way to deal with the head captain's powerful Zanpakuto.

episodes.title: It's All a Trap... Engineered Bonds!
episodes.plot: Ichigo finds out that all of the battles he has fought so far have all been planned beforehand.

episodes.title: The Shocking Truth... The Mysterious Power Within Ichigo!
episodes.plot: As Aizen continues his explanation, someone close to Ichigo joins the battle.

episodes.title: The Extending Blade?! Ichigo vs. Gin!
episodes.plot: As they cross blades, Gin asks Ichigo if he recalls their last encounter, to which Ichigo responds he does not remember Gin's "heart" being present back then.

episodes.title: Film! Festival! Shinigami Film Festival!
episodes.plot: A Seireitei International Film Festival is to be held in the Soul Society, and Nanao recruits Ichigo and his friends to participate in the filming.

episodes.title: Theatre Opening Commemoration! Hell Chapter: Prologue
episodes.plot: While visiting the World of the Living, Rukia comes across Kurumadani, the current Soul Reaper stationed in Karakura Town, being attacked by a mysterious masked man.

episodes.title: Urahara Appears! Stop Aizen!
episodes.plot: Kisuke realizes that Aizen has evaded the Soul Reapers because he has a high Spirit Energy.

episodes.title: Ichigo Loses His Fighting Spirit!? Gin's Expectation!
episodes.plot: Ichigo finds himself cornered against Gin's Bankai. But to Ichigo's surprise, Gin advises him to run from this battle. Meanwhile, Urahara, Yoruichi, and Isshin fight Aizen in a three-on-one battle.

episodes.title: The Final Getsuga Tensho!? Ichigo's Training!
episodes.plot: While going after Aizen, who has left for Karakura Town, Ichigo and Isshin arrive in the Precipice World, a place where time flows two thousand times faster than the outside world.

episodes.title: Real World and Shinigami! The New Year Special
episodes.plot: The Women's Soul Reaper Association is hosting a New Year's party in the Soul Society, when Hitsugaya and the other male Soul Reapers come crashing in.

episodes.title: Gaiden Again! This Time's Enemy Is a Monster?
episodes.plot: Two monster hunters arrive at an old castle where Franken Ichigo, Succubus Rukia, Vampire Uryu, Pumpkin Orihime, Mummy Renji, Witch Rangiku, and Wolfman Hitsugaya all live as lackluster monsters.

episodes.title: Delusion Roars! Hisagi, Towards the Hot Springs Inn!
episodes.plot: Shuhei Hisagi leads a busy life handling the duties of Squad 9 Lieutenant and Editor in Chief of the Seireitei Bulletin, as well as preparing picnic lunches for the Soul Reapers...

episodes.title: For the Sake of Protecting! Ichigo vs. Tensa Zangetsu
episodes.plot: Aizen and Gin close in on Tatsuki, when Don Kanonji comes to the rescue. A still-injured Rangiku also arrives to confront Gin. Meanwhile, seeking to learn the Final Getsugatensho, Ichigo...

episodes.title: Emergency Situation! Aizen, New Evolution!
episodes.plot: As Aizen was about to kill Ichigo's friends, he is stopped by Gin who betrays him after 200 years of their partnership.

episodes.title: Sayonara... Rangiku
episodes.plot: Ichigo arrives to settle his score with Aizen once and for all.

episodes.title: Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Release, the Final Getsuga Tensho!
episodes.plot: Ichigo defeats Aizen with Final Getsuga Tensho which leads the villain to his permanent downfall.

episodes.title: Ichigo's Resolution! The Price of the Fierce Battle
episodes.plot: After Ichigo defeated Aizen with aid from Kisuke, he realizes that what Aizen was really after was someone strong enough to match his strength. Meanwhile, Yamamoto yells at Kenpachi, Byakuya, and Shunsui for ditching their uniforms during their fights with Nnoitora, Zommari, Coyote Starrk and Yammy!

episodes.title: The Soul Detective! Karakuraizer Takes Off Again!
episodes.plot: Karakurizer is back! As Karakurizer, Kon tries to impress the ladies when a man named Michel appears. Strong, kind, handsome, and a true hero, Michel instantly gains popularity...

episodes.title: Inaguration! The Brand New 2nd Division Captain
episodes.plot: While slacking off on his duties, Omaeda falls from a cliff. Recovering from the fall, Omaeda finds a young boy named Ryuzaburo staring at him with admiration and learns that he has...

episodes.title: The Man Who Risked His Life in the 11th Division
episodes.plot: While sparring with Ikkaku and Renji inside Squad 11's dojo, Ichigo meets Seizo, whose mild-mannered personality seems out of place within the hot-blooded Squad 11. Once a powerful Soul Reaper...

episodes.title: Kon Saw It! The Secret of a Beautiful Office Lady
episodes.plot: Kon falls for a beautiful girl who can see spirits

episodes.title: Yachiru's Friend! The Shinigami of Justice Appears!
episodes.plot: Yachiru encounters a Soul Reaper saving a girl from a Hollow, and quickly recognizes him as Masayoshi, her old friend. As the two celebrate their reunion, Yachiru learns that "Mappy" has lost his wife...

episodes.title: Toshiro Hitsugaya's Holiday
episodes.plot: Hitsugaya has taken some time off and comes to Karakura Town to visit Haru, an old lady he met during a previous visit to the World of the Living. Grandma Haru introduces Hitsugaya and Karin...

episodes.title: A New Enemy! The Materialization of Zanpakuto
episodes.plot: A mysterious man who calls himself "Muramasa" appears in the Seireitei to declare war against the Soul Reapers. Using his powers, Muramasa gives physical form to the Zanpakuto and liberates them from the captains and lieutenants of the 13 Court Guard Squads.

episodes.title: Byakuya, Disappearing with the Cherry Blossoms
episodes.plot: Having sustained severe injuries in battle, Rukia escapes to the World of the Living and is saved by Ichigo. A mysterious woman then arrives through the Senkaimon and proceeds to attack the two using the same Zanpakuto as Rukia.

episodes.title: Sode no Shirayuki vs. Rukia! Confused Heart
episodes.plot: After hearing that Byakuya has gone missing, Rukia returns to the Seireitei to search for her brother and in the process comes across Sodenoshirayuki.

episodes.title: Zangetsu Becomes an Enemy
episodes.plot: Muramasa appears before Ichigo and explains how he freed the Zanpakuto from the Soul Reapers, as well as gave them a physical form to exist.

episodes.title: Renji Surprised?! The Two Zabimarus
episodes.plot: The Zanpakuto rebellion has left the Seireitei in a state of destruction with many Soul Reapers still missing, including Squad Six captain Byakuya Kuchiki.

episodes.title: Clash! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
episodes.plot: Inside Ichigo's mind, Muramasa meets Hollow Ichigo. Taking an interest in him, Muramasa attempts to manifest Hollow Ichigo like he did with Zangetsu, only to discover that his spell does not work on Hollow Ichigo.

episodes.title: Release! The New Getsuga Tensho
episodes.plot: Ichigo has regained his Shikai and battles Muramasa. But Zangetsu, who has sided with Muramasa, steps in to fight Ichigo.

episodes.title: Soi Fon, Surrounding the Zanpakuto
episodes.plot: Ichigo's and Renji's victories against their own Zanpakuto has proven that a Soul Reaper can reclaim his Zanpakuto by defeating it in battle.

episodes.title: Friendship? Hatred? Haineko & Tobiume
episodes.plot: Haineko and Tobiume, two Zanpakuto who do not get along, are walking through the woods when they spot Ichigo, who is in pursuit of Senbonzakura and Byakuya.

episodes.title: The Awakening Hyorinmaru! Hitsugaya's Fierce Fight
episodes.plot: The battle of Rangiku and Momo versus Haineko and Tobiume heats up, as both sides try to outsmart their opponents. Elsewhere, captain Toshiro Hitsugaya has located his Zanpakuto Hyorinmaru. But to Toshiro's surprise, Hyorinmaru has lost all trace of his memory following his release by Muramasa. In order to help regain Hyorinmaru's lost memories and prove that he is its true master, Toshiro challenges his Zanpakuto to battle.

episodes.title: Byakuya's Betrayal
episodes.plot: Results from Mayuri Kurotsuchi's experiment using Marechiyo Omaeda's Gegetsuburi show that a manifested Zanpakuto cannot revert to its original sword state when defeated by someone other than its master.

episodes.title: For the Sake of Pride! Byakuya vs. Renji
episodes.plot: The Thirteen Court Guard Squads, particularly Renji and Rukia, are shocked by the news of Byakuya now supposedly working with Muramasa. Meanwhile, inside Muramasa's hideout, the Zanpakuto cannot hide their discomfort over having Byakuya join them.

episodes.title: Shinigami and Zanpakuto, Total Sortie
episodes.plot: At the Squad Six Barracks, Renji and Rukia are determined to know why Byakuya has betrayed the Soul Society to work with Muramasa. Their conversation is cut short by the arrival of the manifested Zanpakuto.

episodes.title: One-to-One Fight! Ichigo vs. Senbonzakura
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers find themselves in a tough battle against the manifested Zanpakuto, including Ichigo who is struggling against Senbonzakura.

episodes.title: The Long Awaited... Kenpachi Appears!
episodes.plot: The battle between Soul Reapers and Zanpakuto heats up as Kenpachi joins in the fight. Kenpachi easily overwhelms the Zanpakuto with his incredible Spirit Energy and then goes off to challenge Byakuya.

episodes.title: Pursue Byakuya! The Confused Gotei Divisions
episodes.plot: Ichigo, Renji, Rukia, and Izuru collapse after being exposed to Konjiki Ashisogijizo's poison. Konjiki Ashisogijizo then seeks for its next prey but is stopped by Yachiru Kusajishi.

episodes.title: Special Mission! Rescue Captain Commander Yamamoto!
episodes.plot: Yoruichi has located Muramasa's hideout where Head Captain Yamamoto is being held. A team comprised of Ichigo, Shunsui, Jushiro, Kenpachi, and Yoruichi sets out to rescue the Head Captain, but the group soon encounters the Zanpakuto who were anticipating their arrival.

episodes.title: Deceived Shinigami! The World Collapse Crisis
episodes.plot: Ichigo battles Muramasa in order to save Head Captain Yamamoto from captivity. Meanwhile, Yoruichi, Shunsui, and Jushiro notice that the Zanpakuto are trying to prevent them from reaching Ichigo, and quickly realize that he was the key to Muramasa's plan all along.

episodes.title: Dragon of Ice and Dragon of Flame! The Strongest Showdown!
episodes.plot: Muramasa's true objective is revealed to be in Karakura Town. Ichigo and the other Soul Reapers try to go after Muramasa, but the manifested Zanpakuto of Genryusai's Ryujinjakka stands in their way.

episodes.title: Senbonzakura's Bankai! Offense and Defense of the Living World
episodes.plot: Uryu, Chad, and Orihime confront Muramasa who has entered the World of the Living. Using teamwork, Uryu and Chad at first appear to gain the upper hand in battle, when Senbonzakura appears to assist Muramasa.

episodes.title: That Man, for the Sake of the Kuchiki
episodes.plot: Centuries ago, Ginrei Kuchiki, Byakuya Kuchiki's grandfather, and his son-in-law Koga Kuchiki were assigned to bring down the rebel forces threatening the Seireitei. With his Zanpakuto Muramasa's power, Koga wipes out the renegade Soul Reapers one after another, and soon his strength becomes known throughout the Soul Society. Yet Koga himself was frustrated by the fact that his father-in-law Ginrei did not seem to acknowledge his accomplishments.

episodes.title: Dark History! The Worst Shinigami Is Born
episodes.plot: Koga Kuchiki escapes his confinement and in the process, kills the Soul Reapers who framed him. Although Ginrei sympathizes with his son-in-law's situation, he reprimands Koga for his rash actions. Enraged, Koga severs his ties with the Kuchiki clan and begins killing Soul Reapers and innocent people.

episodes.title: Byakuya, the Truth Behind His Betrayal
episodes.plot: To uphold the honor of his family, Byakuya Kuchiki fights the resurrected Koga Kuchiki. Meanwhile, the despair of being abandoned by Koga takes its toll on Muramasa's body.

episodes.title: Muramasa's True Identity Revealed
episodes.plot: Koga's betrayal causes Muramasa to lose control over all of the Hollows he absorbed to sustain himself. To make matters worse, his immense Spiritual Pressure begins to attract other Hollows to Karakura Town. As Ichigo, Uryu, Chad, Orihime, and Rukia work together to deal with the situation, Muramasa fires a massive Cero towards them.

episodes.title: Byakuya and Renji, the 6th Division Returns
episodes.plot: Uryu and the others attempt to save Ichigo, who has been engulfed by Muramasa, but with little success. Meanwhile, the Soul Reapers of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads team up with their own Zanpakuto to fight the Hollows that have appeared in the World of the Living.

episodes.title: Final Chapter - Zanpakuto the Alternate Tale
episodes.plot: Inside Muramasa's mind, Ichigo clashes blades with Muramasa. As Muramasa's body and mind reach their limits, he begins to transform into a Hollow. With little time remaining, Ichigo and Muramasa decide to settle their score once and for all.

episodes.title: The Angered Byakuya! The Collapse of the Kuchiki House
episodes.plot: With the defeat of Muramasa, peace has returned to the Soul Society. Renji, Rukia, and the other Soul Reapers are having a good time at the Kuchiki mansion's party, when the place is suddenly attacked by two unknown beings. Having left her Zanpakuto behind, Rukia falls into danger when, to her surprise, the manifested Sodenoshirayuki comes to her rescue.

episodes.title: A New Enemy! The True Nature of the Sword Fiends
episodes.plot: The assailants who attacked the Kuchiki mansion are identified as "Sword Beasts," manifested Zanpakuto of Soul Reapers who lost their lives during the battle with Muramasa. Due to the potential danger, an order is issued throughout the Soul Society to hunt down all remaining Sword Beasts, including ones who have escaped into the World of the Living. Toshiro, Hyorinmaru, Rangiku, and Haineko go after a Sword Beast who is in the World of the Living searching for its master.

episodes.title: Stray Snake, Tortured Monkey
episodes.plot: Renji and Zabimaru (Monkey and Snake) come to the World of the Living to go after a Sword Beast. However, Snake is too distracted by his surroundings, and as a result lets the Sword Beast escape. After being scolded by Renji and Monkey, a frustrated Snake decides he wants to be his own man and runs off.

episodes.title: Terror! The Monster That Lurks Underground
episodes.plot: Isane and Hanataro are troubled by the recent reports of someone stealing food from the Squad Four barracks. Evidence shows that the thief is hiding in an underground waterway, and so a team comprised of Hanataro, Nanao, Ikkaku, and Hozukimaru is sent down for investigation.

episodes.title: Conclusion!? Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
episodes.plot: Following Muramasa's defeat, most of the Zanpakuto have reconciled and returned to their masters, except for Kazeshini, who is still out to kill his former master Shuhei Hisagi. When Kazeshini goes into the Rukon District in the hopes of finding Shuhei, he instead comes across an infant who just lost his father to a Sword Beast. To Kazeshini's annoyance, the infant has taken a liking to the rogue Zanpakuto and now refuses to leave his side.

episodes.title: The Person with the Unknown Ability! Orihime Is Targeted
episodes.plot: A new student Haida Kyoko comes to Orihime's class after a ghost attack on one of the girls in the same classroom.

episodes.title: Haineko Cries! The Tragic Sword Fiend
episodes.plot: During a mission to hunt down the Sword Beasts, Haineko comes across a wounded Sword Beast called Narunosuke and, to her surprise, falls in love with the handsome enemy before her. Believing that Narunosuke is different from other Sword Beasts, Haineko goes against her orders and decides to look after him.

episodes.title: Imprisonment?! Senbonzakura & Zabimaru
episodes.plot: Renji's Zanpakuto Zabimaru, consisting of Monkey and Snake, are irritated over the fact that Byakuya's Senbonzakura is taking all the credit for their work. Later, a small accident leads to the three Zanpakuto becoming trapped inside the Department of Research and Development's facility. As they try to find a means to escape, the two Zabimarus find Senbonzakura to be more troublesome than either of them had anticipated.

episodes.title: Battle of the Females? Katen Kyokotsu vs. Nanao!
episodes.plot: Lieutenant Nanao Ise is paired up with Katenkyokotsu Wakizashi, the shorter of Captain Kyoraku's two swords, to hunt for Sword Beasts. But Nanao finds Wakizashi's malicious and distrustful nature to be quite difficult to work with.

episodes.title: Evolution?! The Menace of the Final Sword Fiend
episodes.plot: The Zanpakuto notice the remaining Sword Beasts acting strangely and realize it to be the work of Kirikaze, a Sword Beast capable of robbing Spirit Energy from others. With their time to manifest as physical entities reaching its limits, the Zanpakuto are determined to carry out their last mission to defeat Kirikaze.

episodes.title: The Soul Burial Detective, Karakura Riser Is Born
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends leave Karakura Town with the intent of bringing Orihime back, and they continue fighting in Hueco Mundo. Nevertheless, Hollows continue to appear in the World of the Living.

episodes.title: Karakuraizâ saigo no hi
episodes.plot: Kisuke Urahara has forced Kon to transform into Konso Cop Karakurizer. As Karakurizer, Kon has some powerful allies: Don Kanonji, who has taken on the form of Karakurizer Spirit, Tatsuki as Karakurizer Beast, Chizuru as Karakurizer Erotic, Keigo as Karakurizer Delicate, and Ururu as Karakurizer Tiny Devil.

episodes.title: Defend Karakura Town! Entire Appearance of the Shinigami
episodes.plot: Sosuke Aizen brings Kaname Tosen, Gin Ichimaru, and the Espadas Stark, Barragan, and Halibel to the World of the Living on a mission to destroy Karakura Town. The Espadas stand before the Thirteen Court Guard Squads.

episodes.title: Elite! The Four Shinigami
episodes.plot: The Head Captain expected the battle to take place in Karakura Town, so he fights to keep it from being destroyed. He places pillars in four corners of the town to switch the real Karakura Town with a replica that was made in the Soul Society.

episodes.title: Beautiful Little Devil Charlotte
episodes.plot: Shuhei, Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Izuru start fighting against the FracciÃ³nes that Barragan deployed. Charlotte Chuhlhourn, who appears before Yumichika, tries to flaunt his beauty, but Yumichika refuses to look at him.

episodes.title: Kira, the Battle Within Despair
episodes.plot: Yumichika is trapped inside Chuhlhourne's briar of darkness. Learning he cannot be seen from the outside world, Yumichika unveils his Zanpakuto's true power.

episodes.title: Hisagi's Shikai! The Name Is...
episodes.plot: Shuhei Hisagi battles Findorr Calius, who has increased his strength level equal to that of a squad lieutenant by shattering his own mask. Shuhei, overwhelmed by the enemy's power, is forced to stay on the defensive.

episodes.title: Ikkaku Falls! The Shinigami's Crisis
episodes.plot: Shuhei, Izuru, Yumichika, and Ikkaku fight to guard the four pillars used to switch the real Karakura Town with a fake one. Despite their efforts, one of the pillars is destroyed by the FracciÃ³n Poww, and the real Karakura Town begins to slowly return to the World of the Living.

episodes.title: The Full Showdown! Shinigami vs. Espada
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers succeed in defending the four pillars from being destroyed, preventing the real Karakura Town from returning to the World of the Living. Feeling responsible for this turn of events, FracciÃ³nes Ggio and Nirgge promise Barragan that they will take care of the Soul Reapers.

episodes.title: The Most Evil Tag!? Soifon & Omaeda
episodes.plot: Soi Fon and Marechiyo Omaeda are to take on Ggio and Nirgge. Soi Fon confidently goes after Ggio, but Ggio puts up a good fight. Ggio restrains Soi Fon with one of his attacks and releases his Tigre Estoque. Meanwhile, Omaeda is struggling in his fight against Nirgge.

episodes.title: A Miraculous Body! Ggio Releases
episodes.plot: Ggio, who released his Hollow power, is overpowering Soi Fon. Marechiyo Omaeda realizes that Soi Fon is in a dire situation and comes to help her. But Soi Fon says that it would be a disgrace for her to accept his help, and she continues to fight Ggio alone.

episodes.title: 3 vs. 1 Battle! Rangiku's Crisis
episodes.plot: Rangiku battles Halibel's three FracciÃ³nes, Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun. She attacks with his Haineko, but even that is not very effective against the three opponents.

episodes.title: All Lieutenants Annihilated! The Terrifying Demonic Beast
episodes.plot: Apache, Mila Rose, and Sun-Sun release their ResurrecciÃ³n forms. In addition, they combine their left arms to create a mysterious monster called Ayon.

episodes.title: Fierce Fighting Concludes? Towards a New Battle!
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers are defeated one after another at the hands of Ayon. Seeing this, Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto decides to get involved. He hits Ayon with one of his attacks, but Ayon doesn't even seem to be hurt by it.

episodes.title: Wonderful Error
episodes.plot: Mizuiro starts at Karakura First High School without any great expectations or ambitions. On the day that the students are assigned to classes, Keigo, who has been hanging around Mizuiro since they met, is shivering with fear.

episodes.title: Summer! Sea! Swimsuit Festival!!
episodes.plot: Rangiku and the members of the Women's Soul Reaper Association take a relaxing trip to a beach in the World of the Living. All the women are excited about wearing bathing suits that they have picked out for the occasion.

episodes.title: Cry of the Soul? The Rug Shinigami is Born!
episodes.plot: Ikkaku and Yumichika are sent after a Hollow that ran away to the World of the Living. They have no prearranged lodging, so they decide to stay at the Asano family house.

episodes.title: The Past Chapter Begins! The Truth from 110 Years Ago
episodes.plot: In the Soul Society 110 years ago, the Thirteen Court Guard Squads are made up of unfamiliar faces. The captain of Squad Five is the masked Visored, Shinji Hirako who currently resides in the World of the Living.

episodes.title: 12th Division's New Captain, Kisuke Urahara
episodes.plot: Kisuke Urahara replaces the newly promoted Kirio Hikifune as captain of Squad Twelve. Hiyori Sarugaki, lieutenant of Squad Twelve, cannot hide her dissatisfaction with the new captain.

episodes.title: Aizen and the Genius Boy
episodes.plot: Kisuke takes Hiyori to the Special underground Confinement Unit inside the Squad Two barracks. Nicknamed the Maggot's Nest, this place imprisons enlisted Thirteen Court Guard Squad members whose beliefs or actions have been deemed dangerous.

episodes.title: Muguruma 9th Division, Moves Out
episodes.plot: Nine years have passed since Kisuke Urahara was appointed captain of Squad Twelve. Bizarre deaths start to occur in the Rukon District where people disappear, leaving only their clothes behind.

episodes.title: Hiyori Dies? The Beginning of Tragedy
episodes.plot: Kensei Muguruma's and Mashiro Kuna's Spiritual Pressure disappears. The Seireitei deems this a dire situation. Kisuke Urahara, who sent Hiyori to Squad Nine, volunteers to go to the scene of their disappearance, as he is worried that she has yet to return.

episodes.title: Betrayal! Aizen's Secret Maneuvers
episodes.plot: At Squad Nine's camp, Shinji Hirako and the others run into Kensei Muguruma, who is donning a strange mask. Kensei starts to attack them, and he is too powerful to stop even with all of them combined.

episodes.title: Rescue Hirako! Aizen vs. Urahara
episodes.plot: Aizen confidently tells Kisuke that he was hollowfying his captain from the moment Kisuke guessed it.

episodes.title: Hueco Mundo Chapter, Restart!
episodes.plot: The Hueco Mundo Arc, which was put on hold for the New Captain Shusuke Amagai Arc, resumes. Ichigo, Rukia, Uryu, Chad, and Renji break into Hueco Mundo, the headquarters of Sosuke Aizen and his Arrancars, to rescue Orihime.

episodes.title: The Frightening Banquet, Szayel Aporro Theater
episodes.plot: Uryu and Renji thought they had escaped, but they find themselves back at Szayelaporro's palace. There, Szayelaporro, dressed in something new, shows up with a daring smirk on his face. His palace has been built exactly as he wishes.

episodes.title: Nel's Secret, a Busty Beauty Joins the Battle!?
episodes.plot: Nel returns to her true form to save Ichigo from the evil Nnoitra Gilga.

episodes.title: Irresistible, Puppet Show of Terror
episodes.plot: Uryu and Renji continue fighting their clones. But no matter how many times they beat them, the clones turn back into liquid, multiply, and revive. The two of them expect a futile fight against these clones that keep increasing in number, but then, Uryu finds a slight difference between them and the clones.

episodes.title: Nelliel's Past
episodes.plot: Nnoitora and Nelliel continue to battle. They are nearly equal in strength. The two of them used to fight side by side as fellow Espadas. However, Nnoitora always hated Nelliel and has challenged her to a duel a number of times, only to lose every time.

episodes.title: The Ultimate Union! Pesche's Seriousness
episodes.plot: Nelliel regains her memory, and Pesche and Dondochakka realize that she is going to give her all in the battle against Nnoitora. In order to go fight with Nelliel, Pesche and Dondochakka summon all their strength.

episodes.title: Joining the Battle! The Strongest Shinigami Army Appears
episodes.plot: Kenpachi rescues Ichigo and Nel from being killed by Nnoitora as he battles the cruel espada while Byakuya and Miyaru deal with two of their arrancar counterparts.

episodes.title: Byakuya's Bankai, the Quiet Anger
episodes.plot: Byakuya visits Rukia, who is unconscious after being injured in the battle against Aaroniero Arruruerie. Zommari Rureaux, Espada Number 7, happens to be there, attempting to finish her off.

episodes.title: The Two Scientists, Mayuri's Trap
episodes.plot: Zommari's technique, "Amor," takes control over anything its eyes gaze upon. He uses this power to control Rukia's body and use her as a shield. This angers Byakuya, and he releases his Bankai, Gokei Senbonzakura Kageyoshi, destroying Aaroniero's palace.

episodes.title: Holy Birth, the Resurrected Szayel Aporro
episodes.plot: Szayelaporro is exasperated when his powers don't work at all against Mayuri Kurotsuchi, and he ends up being enveloped by Mayuri's Konjiki Ashisogijizo. Just then, something happens to Nemu, who was being held hostage.

episodes.title: The Hardest Body!? Cut Down Nnoitra
episodes.plot: Kenpachi becomes excited as he fights Nnoitora with sheer insanity.

episodes.title: Nnoitra Released! Multiplying Arms
episodes.plot: Kenpachi goes after Nnoitora's eye and pierces his eye patch, but the eye patch was hiding a dreadful secret. Nnoitora celebrates a victory, but Kenpachi continues fighting and gets a thrill out of trying to cut Nnoitora.

episodes.title: Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Who's the Strongest?
episodes.plot: When Kenpachi's eye patch comes off, releasing his Spiritual Pressure and true strength, Nnoitora invokes his sword attack, Santa Teresa. Ichigo and the others are surprised by the six-armed monstrous figure.

episodes.title: Karakura Town Gathers! Aizen Versus the Soul Reapers
episodes.plot: Nnoitora has never shown any mercy to his opponents, and he has always finished them off. Nnoitora's reason for fighting has always been purely to fight. He has been fighting and becoming stronger, hoping to someday die in battle.

episodes.title: Ichigo's Seppuku Persuasion Strategy
episodes.plot: After ending the battle against Shusuke Amagai, the noble Kasumiohji Clan tries to restore peace. But one day, Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, who supposedly became the head of the family, goes off to the World of the Living by herself after getting in a fight with Kenryu.

episodes.title: Thump! A Kemari Tournament Filled with Hollows
episodes.plot: Rurichiyo and Kenryu's fight was over how to revitalize the Kasumiohji Clan. Rurichiyo is concerned about the low spirits of her people, and she wants to host a soccer tournament.

episodes.title: The New Captain Appears! His Name Is Shusuke Amagai
episodes.plot: A new captain joins Squad Three, taking the place of the rebel Gin Ichimaru. His name is Shusuke Amagai. Shusuke is an unknown captain who was away on a long-term assignment and has only recently returned to the Seireitei.

episodes.title: New Development, the Dangerous Transfer Student Appears!
episodes.plot: In the middle of the night, a strange Senkaimon opens in Karakura Town, and a mysterious team of three arrives in the World of the Living. That morning, when Ichigo and Rukia go to school, they get word of a Hollow sighting.

episodes.title: Desperate Struggle Under the Moonlit Night, the Mysterious Assassin and Zanpakuto
episodes.plot: A mysterious team of three transfers into Ichigo's class. Their names are Rurichiyo Kasumiohji, Kenryu, and Enryu. Rurichiyo acts like a princess, and Kenryu and Enryu obsessively guard her surroundings. Ichigo is clearly suspicious of the three of them, but the rest of his classmates welcome them without question.

episodes.title: The Profusion of Blooming Flowers
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Rukia assume the responsibility of being Rurichiyo's bodyguard. It is Rurichiyo's first time in the World of the Living, and she asks Ichigo to teach her about everything she sees. Rukia takes Rurichiyo out to play. Kenryu and Enryu cry tears of joy at seeing Rurichiyo have fun in the World of the Living...

episodes.title: Kibune Goes to War! The Violent Wind That Rages
episodes.plot: Since welcoming Shusuke Amagai as the new captain, Squad Three has been hard at work. But the duties Shusuke assigns them are tasks that one couldn't imagine a Soul Reaper doing. Izuru Kira senses the dissatisfaction of the squad members, and as Lieutenant, he decides to advise the new captain.

episodes.title: The Appearance of the Great Evil! The Darkness in the House of Kasumioji
episodes.plot: One morning, Rurichiyo suddenly disappears. Kenryu finds some indication that leads him to believe that she used the Kasumiohji Clan's private Senkaimon to return to the Soul Society. He heads back to the Soul Society along with Ichigo and Rukia to look for Rurichiyo.

episodes.title: Break the Mirror's Boundary! Ichigo's Captivity
episodes.plot: Ichigo returns to the World of the Living, and he draws up a countermeasure at Kisuke Urahara's shop. According to Kisuke, there is a shortage of a kind of Reishi that is used as a raw material for merchandise at the shop. He says it is not a natural phenomenon, but that it is highly likely that someone is behind it all.

episodes.title: The Revenging Assassin, Ichigo Is Targeted
episodes.plot: Hanza Nukui, the leader of Gyokaku Kumoi's assassins, has misjudged the power of Ichigo and his friends, and has failed to assassinate Rurichiyo. He forms a unit of assassins, armed with powerful Bakkouto swords, and prepares to go back to the World of the Living.

episodes.title: Mystery! The Sword-Consuming Assassin
episodes.plot: Hanza Nukui and his team of assassins, armed with Bakkoutos, arrive in the World of the Living, and they challenge Ichigo and the others to fight. When Ichigo and Hanza take off to fight one on one, a creepy assassin, Jinnai Douko, appears before Rurichiyo, wielding a Bakkouto.

episodes.title: The Reversal of Rukia! The Rampaging Blade
episodes.plot: The respective battles of Rukia, Uryu, and Chad continue. Jinnai Douko becomes one with his Bakkouto, Retsurai, and keeps attacking. Rukia has a tough battle against Jinnai, whose whole body transforms into a weapon. Uryu, who is fighting against Kuzuryu, is trapped inside a sea of mist...

episodes.title: The Nightmare Which Is Shown, Ichigo's Inside the Mirror
episodes.plot: Hanza Nukui uses his Bakkouto, Saiga's weak point, to act as a trap for Ichigo. Ichigo ends up getting caught in Hanza's scheme, an expanse of mirrors. The mirrors take the memories of the captive and turn them into nightmares.

episodes.title: Confrontation?! Amagai vs. Gotei 13
episodes.plot: At a captain's meeting in the Soul Society, Shusuke Amagai proposes to the Thirteen Court Guard Squads that they train directly with the squads. But Kenpachi Zaraki and Mayuri Kurotsuchi speak out against the idea, and the captains object due to their lack of interest.

episodes.title: The Princess' Decision, the Sorrowful Bride
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends have narrowly escaped Hanza Nukui's team's attacks. But Uryu and Chad have been inundated with the Spirit Energy of Bakkoutos, and Orihime's healing power doesn't seem to be working.

episodes.title: The 2nd Division Sorties! Ichigo Is Surrounded
episodes.plot: Rurichiyo has gone back to the Soul Society to take back control of the Kasumiohji Clan. Ichigo, Rukia, Kenryu, and Enryu follow her through the Senkaimon, and they barge in on Rurichiyo and Shu's wedding at the Kasumiohji palace. However, the Soul Reapers of Squad Two, led by Soi Fon, are waiting for them there.

episodes.title: Amagai's True Strength, Zanpakuto Is released!
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Rukia are being chased down by the Thirteen Court Guard Squads after sabotaging Rurichiyo and Shu's wedding and taking Shu hostage. The Soul Reapers, led by Squads Two and Three, put out an intense search effort, but when dawn comes they still haven't found Ichigo and Rukia.

episodes.title: The Darkness Which Moves! Kibune's True Colors
episodes.plot: After Shu Kannogi tearfully tells Shusuke Amagai how he feels, Shusuke loses his feelings of ill will towards Ichigo and instead decides to help in their search for Rurichiyo. Ichigo worries that this would be considered an act of betrayal to the Thirteen Court Guard Squads on Shusuke's part.

episodes.title: Kira and Kibune, Offense and Defense of the 3rd Division
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers stop chasing after Ichigo for the time being and focus on restoring order in the Seireitei. In the midst of it all, Jushiro Ukitake and Shunsui Kyoraku begin to question why Genryusai doesn't enter the Kasumiohji Clan's grounds. In the meantime, Ichigo and Shusuke rush to the Third Squad's barracks at Izuru's notification.

episodes.title: Ice and Flame! Fierce Fight of Amagai vs. Hitsugaya
episodes.plot: The intense battle between Izuru Kira and Makoto Kibune continues at Squad Three's training facility. Makoto, who was tired of not being taken seriously despite possessing an overwhelming amount of Spiritual Pressure, took part in the Kasumiohji Clan's conspiracy in order to become the best Soul Reaper.

episodes.title: Sortie Orders! Suppress the House of Kasumioji
episodes.plot: At the Head Captain's command, all the Soul Reapers of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads break into the Kasumiohji Clan's palace at once. The Kasumiohji Clan is a special aristocratic family who make the swords presented to the royal family. They are exempt from the law, and the Soul Reapers cannot do anything about that.

episodes.title: Ichigo Rages! The Assassin's Secret
episodes.plot: The battle at the Kasumiohji Clan's palace between the Thirteen Court Guard Squads and the Kasumiohji Clan's assassins continues. Against the Soul Reapers, the assassins use Bakkoutos, which forcibly emit more power than the wielder himself can actually produce.

episodes.title: Duel! Amagai vs. Ichigo
episodes.plot: The chaos in the Kasumiohji Clan was all a scheme formulated by Shusuke Amagai. Shusuke joined the Thirteen Court Guard Squads in order to avenge his father's death at the hands of Head Captain Yamamoto. For years, Shusuke has been seeking an opportunity to kill him.

episodes.title: The Fallen Shinigami's Pride
episodes.plot: Shusuke Amagai wields both a Bakkouto, which seals the powers of Soul Reapers, and his Bankai, Raika Gouenkaku. Ichigo defends against Shusuke's Bankai while Hollowfied and counterattacks with his most powerful Getsugatensho.

episodes.title: Ichigo Strikes Back! This Is My Bankai
episodes.plot: Dordoni the Arrancar is a Privaron Espada, a former Espada. Ichigo underestimates his strength and is quickly driven into a corner when Dordoni releases his Zanpakuto.

episodes.title: The Devilish Research! Szayel Aporro's Plan
episodes.plot: Dordoni makes a final attempt to win his battle, but he is defeated by a Hollowfied Ichigo.

episodes.title: Rukia to Kaien, kanashimi no saikai
episodes.plot: In the depths of Las Noches, Rukia encounters Ninth Espada Aaroniero Arruruerie in an area with a blue sky.

episodes.title: Rukia hangeki! Kesshi no kidou o hanate
episodes.plot: Rukia is angered when Kaien tells her to hand over her friends in return for letting her go and is convinced that this Kaien is a fake.

episodes.title: Ishida & Pesche, the United Attack of Friendship
episodes.plot: Uryu is having a tough time fighting against Privaron Espada Cirucci, whose whip attacks are ever changing.

episodes.title: Ishida's Trump Card, Seele Schneider
episodes.plot: Pesche's unusual ability allows Uryu to damage Cirucci. Cirucci releases her Zanpakuto and attacks the two until she has them cornered.

episodes.title: Right Arm of the Giant, Left Arm of the Devil
episodes.plot: Chad faces the Privaron Espada Gantenbainne and survives many of his fierce attacks. Chad reveals the power of his right arm, Brazo Derecho Del Gigante.

episodes.title: Yasutora Sado Dies! Orihime's Tears
episodes.plot: Nnoitra, one of the Espada, suddenly appears and defeats Chad in a single strike.

episodes.title: Testament, Your Heart Is Right Here...
episodes.plot: Aaroniero has the ability to utilize the Spiritual Pressure of the Hollows that he devours.

episodes.title: The Cruel Arrancar, Ulquiorra's Provocation
episodes.plot: Renji meets Espada Number Eight, Szayel Aporro Grantz. Renji attempts to use his Bankai but fails because of restrictions that Szayel Aporro has placed on the room they are in that limit Renji's power.

episodes.title: Szayel Aporro Laughs, the Net Trapping Renji Is Complete
episodes.plot: Ulquiorra overpowers Ichigo with his solid body and speed.

episodes.title: Shinigami and Quincy, the Battle of Madness
episodes.plot: Lolly and Menoly are jealous that Aizen is treating Orihime well, so they go to Orihime's room to harass her. Orihime tries to stay strong, but they are relentless.

episodes.title: Ishida's Strategy, the 20-second Offense and Defense
episodes.plot: Szayel Aporro has analyzed Uryu's and Renji's Spiritual Pressures and has sealed away most of their abilities.

episodes.title: Murderous Intent! The Joyful Grimmjow
episodes.plot: Grimmjow takes Orihime without permission and forces her to heal Ichigo. He wants to settle things with Ichigo while he's in his best condition.

episodes.title: Desperate Effort vs. Desperate Effort! The Hollowized Ichigo
episodes.plot: A wild battle begins between Ichigo and Grimmjow. As swords and Spiritual Pressures clash, Grimmjow unleashes his strongest Cero, the Gran Rey Cero.

episodes.title: The Moment of Conclusion, the End of Grimmjow
episodes.plot: Ichigo defeats Grimmjow the 6th Espada.

episodes.title: Hitsugaya, Karin and Soccer Ball
episodes.plot: To win the control over a soccer field, Karin Kurosaki agrees to a soccer match against older students. She asks Toshiro Hitsugaya for help.

episodes.title: Ikkaku's Hot-Blooded Kendo Tale
episodes.plot: Karakura First High School's kendo team is ambushed, and the captain and all of the main members are seriously injured.

episodes.title: The Beautiful Patissier, Yumichika!
episodes.plot: The Head Captain orders Mayuri Kurotsuchi to simplify the procedures to perform Gentei Kaijo, a restriction release for the Spiritual Pressure of the Advance Troops while in the World of the Living.

episodes.title: Kon Is Deceived! Rangiku on the Lookout..
episodes.plot: Kon, lonely and bored due to Rukia's and Orihime's absence, decides to pay a visit to Rangiku.

episodes.title: Civil War in Hueco Mondo! Ulquiorra's Death
episodes.plot: Trouble is brewing in Las Noches, Aizen's palace in the Hollow realm, Hueco Mundo. One of the Arrancars, Patras, rebels against Aizen and tries to steal the Hogyoku.

episodes.title: The Malicious Battle, Aizen's Trap
episodes.plot: Renji's fight with Patras continues as it destroys Urahara's shop and parts of Karakura Town.

episodes.title: Hueco Mondo Moves Again! Hitsugaya vs. Yammy
episodes.plot: There are only a few months left until the showdown with the Arrancars. Ichigo continues to train with the Visoreds, but the amount of time in which he can remain Hollowfied hasn't increased by much.

episodes.title: Ichigo vs. Grimmjow, the 11-second Battle
episodes.plot: Arrancars suddenly appear in the World of the Living. Yammy, Luppi, Grimmjow, and Wonderweiss are confronted by Hitsugaya's advance troops and Ichigo.

episodes.title: Ulquiorra's Scheme, the Moment When the Sun Sets
episodes.plot: Hitsugaya's advance troops continue to fight the Arrancars who appeared in Karakura Town. Urahara shows up to help.

episodes.title: Goodbye..., Kurosaki-kun
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends manage to drive away Grimmjow and the other Arrancars. But behind the scenes, Aizen orders Ulquiorra to bring Orihime to Hueco Mundo.

episodes.title: Strict Order! The Forbidden Rescue of Orihime Inoue
episodes.plot: Ichigo awakens to realize that the serious injuries he received from Grimmjow's attack have completely healed. He senses that Orihime came to his room from the traces of Spiritual Pressure that she left behind.

episodes.title: Grimmjow Revived
episodes.plot: Ichigo goes with Sado and Ichida to Hueco Mundo, and Orihime helps Grimmjow retrieve his hands upon order from Aizen to show her powers to the rest of the Arrancers.

episodes.title: Ishida and Chad, the Quickening of a New Power
episodes.plot: Orihime has been kidnapped by Sosuke Aizen and the Arrancars. Ichigo decides to go to Hueco Mundo in order to save her.

episodes.title: The Espada Gather! Aizen's Royal Assembly
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends defeat the Arrancars Iceringer and Demora, whom they meet in underground corridor 22.

episodes.title: The Name Is Nel! The Appearance of the Strange Arrancar
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends save a girl who is being attacked by mysterious Arrancars.

episodes.title: Forest of Menos! Search for the Missing Rukia
episodes.plot: In a second attempt to defeat Runuganga, the Guardian of the White Sands, Rukia uses Sodenoshirayuki, but her attack backfires when she accidentally stabs Bawabawa in the back.

episodes.title: Ashido, the Soul Reaper Who Came from the Past
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends have fallen into the Menos Forest. They fight off attacks from Gillians while they look for Rukia and Nel, who have been separated from the group.

episodes.title: Through the Crumbling Forest, a Million Menos
episodes.plot: Ashido and Rukia continue to battle Pequenos, one of the Adjuchas who controls the Menos Forest.

episodes.title: Oath! Back Here Alive Again
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends arrive at Las Noches, Aizen's stronghold, where they break through a wall and charge into the palace.

episodes.title: The Raging Storm! Encounter with the Dancing Arrancar
episodes.plot: Ichigo, Uryu, Chad, Rukia, and Renji go their separate ways down the corridors of Las Noches and vow to safely reunite.

episodes.title: Daikô-gyô saikai! Kyôfu no tenkôsei
episodes.plot: It's back to high school and Hollow slaying for Ichigo Kurosaki, who is now officially recognized as a Substitute Soul Reaper by the Soul Society. On the day he returns to Karakura First High School, Ichigo meets an unusual new student named Shinji Hirako.

episodes.title: Kyôgaku! Oyaji tachi no shôtai
episodes.plot: Uryu is attacked by a Menos Grande and is saved by his father, Ryuken. Ryuken defeats the Menos with a single attack. He tells Uryu that he can help him regain his powers but only under Ryuken's conditions.

episodes.title: Tatakai no hajimari, kamen no gunzei to arankaru
episodes.plot: Isshin Kurosaki shows up in his Soul Reaper form and defeats Grand Fisher with a single strike. When Kisuke Urahara appears, Isshin and Kisuke discuss the fact that Sosuke Aizen has made contact with Hollows...

episodes.title: Sekai hôkai eno jokyoku, Arankaru raishû
episodes.plot: Ichigo senses that the hollow within him is getting stronger and fears that he'll be swallowed whole in his current state. Meanwhile, the Soul Society's Department of Research and Development detects large amounts of spiritual pressure headed toward Karakura Town.

episodes.title: Saikai, Ichigo to Rukia to Shinigami tachi
episodes.plot: Orihime and Chad are in danger and Ichigo rushes to their aid. He immediately uses his Bankai and clashes with the brutish Arrancar, Yammy.

episodes.title: Tokumei! Yattekita Shinigami tachi
episodes.plot: Renji, Ikaku, Yumichika, Rangiku, Toshiro and Rukia came to the material world to join Ichigo with fight against the Arrancar.

episodes.title: Ashiki hitomi, Aizen futatabi
episodes.plot: Ulquiorra and Yammy have returned to the Hollow World, Hueco Mundo. They report to Sosuke Aizen and twenty other Arrancars about their fight with Ichigo and his friends.

episodes.title: Rukia sentô kaishi! Kôritsuki shiroki ha
episodes.plot: The Arrancar, Grimmjow, has entered the World of the Living and he has brought a group of minions from Hueco Mundo with him. The Arrancars' goal is to kill anyone who possesses the slightest amount of spiritual pressure.

episodes.title: Ikkaku bankai! Subete o kudaku chikara
episodes.plot: Ikkaku and the Arrancar, Edrad, have a fierce battle in the streets of Karakura Town. Yumichika stands aside and watches because he knows that Ikkaku will be furious if he interferes.

episodes.title: Zaraki-tai hiwa! Tsuiteru otoko-tachi
episodes.plot: Ikkaku releases his Bankai, Ryumon Hozukimaru, which he has kept a secret for some time. He clashes with Edrad, who shows his true power by releasing his zanpakuto.

episodes.title: Hitsugaya chiru! Kudaketa Hyorinmaru
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers struggle against the might of the Arrancars. Despite the Arrancar Shawlong's overwhelming strength, Captain Hitsugaya continues his attacks.

episodes.title: Clash! The Protector Vs. the Bearer
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers receive permission from the Soul Society to use Gentei Kaijo, a spiritual pressure restriction release.

episodes.title: Vizard! The Power of the Awakened
episodes.plot: Grimmjow is the only survivor of the Arrancars' intense battle with the Soul Reapers. He returns with Tosen to Sosuke Aizen's palace, Las Noches in Hueco Mundo.

episodes.title: Ichigo, Complete Hollowification?!
episodes.plot: Ichigo visits Shinji Hirako at the Visoreds' hideout in order to find out how to control his inner Hollow. He tries to get an answer by force, but Hiyori Sarugaki interrupts his battle with Shinji.

episodes.title: Clash! The Black Bankai and the White Bankai
episodes.plot: Ichigo has begun training with the Visoreds in order to learn how to suppress his inner hollow. He enters his inner world and is greeted by the mirror image of himself holding a white Zangetsu.

episodes.title: Urgent Report! Aizen's Terrifying Plan!
episodes.plot: Ichigo has entered his inner world and is blocking fierce attacks made by another Ichigo who wields a white Zangetsu. Ichigo is cornered as images of Byakuya Kuchiki and Jin Kariya pummel him into the ground.

episodes.title: Uryu vs. Ryuken! Clash of the Parent-Child Quincies
episodes.plot: Sosuke Aizen's ultimate goal of killing the Soul King has been revealed. The Soul Society has learned that in order to gain access to the Royal Family's palace, Aizen will need a key known as the Ouken.

episodes.title: Urahara's Decision, Orihime's Thoughts
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends undergo exhaustive training in preparation for the upcoming winter showdown with Sosuke Aizen. Kisuke summons Orihime to his underground training facility...

episodes.title: The Nightmare Arrancar! Team Hitsugaya Moves Out
episodes.plot: Captain Hitsugaya's advance troops remain in Karakura Town to prepare for the showdown with Sosuke Aizen. Rangiku is fascinated by life in the world of the living, and she finds it impossible to devote her time to training.

episodes.title: The Swooping Descent of the Dark Emissary! The Propagation of Malice
episodes.plot: Rangiku saves a young soul named Shota from being attacked by a Mock Arrancar. Believing this to be Aizen's doing, Captain Hitsugaya decides to hold off on Shota's soul burial to further investigate the situation.

episodes.title: The Invisible Enemy! Hitsugaya's Merciless Decision
episodes.plot: Hitsugaya and his advanced troops learn that Shota's little sister Yui was the Mock Arrancar's first victim. Shota abandoned Yui out of fear and blames himself for the entire incident.

episodes.title: Rangiku's Tears, the Sorrowful Parting of Brother and Sister
episodes.plot: It is revealed that the Mock Arrancar gained an explosive amount of strength when it devoured Yui and has reanimated her soul to use her as bait to lure and attack human souls.

episodes.title: Shinigami sekai e no totsunyû, futatabi
episodes.plot: Kariya and other Bounts arrive in the Soul Society and find themselves in a fight with Soul Reapers--Lieutenant Omaeda of Squad 2 and Lieutenant Iba of Squad 7. With the abundance of reishi in the Soul Society, the Bounts are able to absorb them quickly, giving them power.

episodes.title: Baunto kyôshû! Gekishin no Gotei jûsan-tai
episodes.plot: Rukia fights with Yoshi, the Bount, in the Rukon district on her way back to rejoining Squad 13. Since Rukia's Spirit Energy hasn't fully returned, she finds herself in a pinch.

episodes.title: Hitsugaya no ketsui! Gekitotsu no toki semaru
episodes.plot: Hitsugaya and the others investigate the Senzaikyu, which was destroyed by Jin Kariya and his group. Meanwhile, Rukia, who was injured in a fight with Yoshi, is transferred and treated in the Kuchiki house. Ichigo follows her there and asks Byakuya to fight with him against the Bounts.

episodes.title: Byakuya shutsujin! Kaze o saku sakura no mai
episodes.plot: Byakuya and Kariya start fighting in a forest in Kusajishi. Kariya attacks Byakuya, who silently thrusts his sword at Kariya. During the close battle, Byakuya finally releases his zanpakuto, but Kariya's invisible Dolls bounce the Senbonzakura back.

episodes.title: Ichigo - Byakuya - Kariya, sankyoku no tatakai!
episodes.plot: Ichigo rushes to the site where Byakuya and Kariya are fighting and releases his Bankai upon Kariya. Byakuya also releases his Bankai to attack Kariya, but Ichigo and Byakuya are not in sync and can't harm Kariya.

episodes.title: Hitsugaya shutsugeki! Mori nonaka no teki okire
episodes.plot: Hitsugaya learns that the Bounts have gathered mobs, so he goes to the forest in Kusajishi with Rangiku and Renji and starts investigating. Meanwhile, buildings in the Seireitei that were destroyed by Ichinose are being restored.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu! Zaraki Kenpachi VS Ichinose Maki
episodes.plot: Hitsugaya and the others arrive at the Bounts' hideout, where Ichinose is waiting for them alone. Ichinose plans to detain them himself to help Kariya and his group, who are already headed for the Seireitei.

episodes.title: Shinigami VS Shinigami! Bôsô suru chikara
episodes.plot: Jin Kariya and his group of Bounts pick up where they left off as they successfully open the Seireitei gate. Just as they enter, Jin Kariya tells the group of ruffians he doesn't need them anymore, and quickly disposes of them as they try to attack him. Ichigo and the others eventually reach Seireitei with an injured Jidanbo's help. Soifon and the Executive Militia separate to try and find the Bounts. Mabashi and his doll, Ritz, quickly dispose of most of them and control some of them. Sensing that Mabashi has done a good job, Sawatari walks away as Mayuri Kurotsuchi ...

episodes.title: Soi Fong shisu? Onmitsu kidô no saigo
episodes.plot: Soi Fon is poisoned by a member of her punishment force, which is under Ritze's control. Having increased her power, Ritze now can control several Soul Reapers at a time.

episodes.title: Mayuri Bankai! Sawatari: Akuma no gekitotsu
episodes.plot: Sawatari enters the Seireitei and sees Mayuri Kurotsuchi, the captain of Squad 12. Mayuri proposes that he become a guinea pig for an experiment, but Sawatari refuses and attacks Mayuri using the Doll Baura.

episodes.title: Saigo no kuinshî! Bôhatsu suru chikara
episodes.plot: The battle between the Soul Reapers and Bounts intensifies. Kariya suddenly appears at the Department of Research and Development, where he looks for an original crest of the Bount in the bureau and interrogates Nemu.

episodes.title: Ishida, genkai okoete ute!
episodes.plot: Uryu is severely injured by Nieder's attack but tries desperately to counterattack, though his bow seems to have run out of power. Yoshi thoroughly revels in the fight in the Soul Society because she can do whatever she wants.

episodes.title: Shitô Jû-ban-tai! Hyorinmaru o hanate
episodes.plot: The Soul Reapers of Squad 10 find Koga. Hitsugaya, with all the Soul Reapers of Squad 10, use Kurahito's Bount sensor and tries to capture Koga, who flees the Seireitei.

episodes.title: Kariya! Bakuhatsu eno kauntodaun
episodes.plot: Captain Hitsugaya has defeated Koga, leaving Jin Kariya as the last surviving Bount. When Hitsugaya returns to the Squad Ten barracks, he finds that Ichigo and his friends have made themselves at home while Uryu recovers from his fight with Yoshi.

episodes.title: Inochi to fukushû! Ishida, kyûkyoku no sentaku
