episodes.plot: During the battle between Jin Kariya and Rantao, Karyia learns the origin of his powers. Rantao pleads with Kariya to use the Jokai Crest to save the Bounts and he is forced to remember his lifetime of oppression and his reasons to destroy the Soul Society.

episodes.title: Furi orosareta ha! Hametsu no shunkan
episodes.plot: Ichigo arrives just in time, as Uryu and Rantao struggle to fend off Jin Kariya. Captain Hitsugaya and the others try to go after Ichigo, but Rantao stops them.

episodes.title: Dôkoku no baunto! Saigo no gekitotsu
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Jin Kariya's final clash begins on Sokyoku hill. Ichigo realizes that Kariya's fighting style consists of counterattacks that rely on his incredible ability to recover. Ichigo uses Tensa Zangetsu's speed to attack Kariya...

episodes.title: Ichigo to Rukia, kaiten suru omoi
episodes.plot: It has been a few days since Jin Kariya was defeated, and all of the Jokai Crests have been sealed away. Ichigo and his friends rest until the Senkaimon is prepared so that they can return to the World of the Living.

episodes.title: Shingakki, gense ni Renji ga yate kita!?
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends have returned from the Soul Society and are finally able to get back to their "normal" lives.

episodes.title: Shinobi yoru kyôfu, 2-banme no giseisha
episodes.plot: Ichigo and his friends meet at school and set out to look for Orihime the day after her disappearance.

episodes.title: Toppa seyo! Meikyû ni hisomu wana
episodes.plot: After Chad's kidnapping, Ichigo and the others go to Urahara to explain their predicament.

episodes.title: Shi no gêmu! Kieru kurasumeito
episodes.plot: Chad and Orihime are rescued, but when Lirin tells them that one of their friends has been replaced by an impostor, they realize that the game is not over.

episodes.title: Akuma no shôtai, akasa reta himitsu
episodes.plot: Lirin sets in place a giant gate that begins to devour everything in Karakura Town. The only way to have Chad released and save the town is to destroy the gate.

episodes.title: So no na wa Baunto! Tamashî wo karu mono-tashi
episodes.plot: New information has come to light regarding an unusual race known as Bounts. Kisuke Urahara explains that Bounts are beings that gain eternal life by absorbing the souls of humans.

episodes.title: Rukia no kikan! Daikô chîmu fukkatsu
episodes.plot: Ichigo and Lirin find themselves in a pinch when they are attacked by the Bount Yoshino Soma and her Doll, Goethe.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu no toki! Kunishî ni semaru ma no te
episodes.plot: Ichigo, Rukia, Orihime, Chad, and Uryu surround the Bount Ryo Udagawa, but they find themselves at a slight disadvantage when he releases the immense power of his Doll, Friede.

episodes.title: Mizu no kôgeki! Tozasareta byôin kara no dasshutsu
episodes.plot: Uryu, who is seriously hurt in the Bount attack, is hospitalized at Karakura Hospital. Ichigo and the others, knowing that Quincys are being targeted, decide to protect Uryu in the hospital...

episodes.title: Baunto shûketsu! Ugokidasu otoko
episodes.plot: Ichigo and the others run from the twin Bounts, Ho and Ban, who have attacked them at the hospital...

episodes.title: Eien o ikiru ichizoku no kioku
episodes.plot: Uryu was knocked unconscious during Ho and Ban's attack but was saved by Yoshino...

episodes.title: Jûichi-ban tai gekishin! Yomigaetta Shinigami
episodes.plot: Uryu is listening to the history of the Bounts at Yoshino's hideout when Koga, a Bount, attacks. Uryu and Yoshino battle Koga's Steel Doll Dalk, but Yoshino's flame Goethe is no match for the steel Dalk...

episodes.title: Chikara no gekitotsu! Furîdo VS Zangetsu
episodes.plot: Ichigo, Rukia, Lirin, Noba, and Kurodo enter the Bount mansion and for the first time come face to face with Jin Kariya and the other Bounts...

episodes.title: Kie nu on'nen! Kenpachi ga kitta Shinigami
episodes.plot: Udagawa, who betrayed Jin Kariya, is brought down by former Squad 11 Soul Reaper Maki Ichinose. Then Ichinose turns his zanpakuto onto Ichigo...

episodes.title: Gotei jûsan-tai kyôgaku!! Rekishi ni umoreta shinjitsu
episodes.plot: Thanks to Yoruichi's surprise attack, Ichigo and his cohorts barely manage to escape Jin Kariya's mansion. Uryu and Yoshino have sustained serious injuries and are treated at Urahara's Shop...

episodes.title: Yoshino, shi o kaketa omoi
episodes.plot: Yoshino leaves the Urahara's Shop at the crack of dawn. Yoshino is aware of Jin Kariya's ambition and is determined to stop him at the risk of her life...

episodes.title: Kyôteki no kyûshû! Chîsana saishû bôei-sen!?
episodes.plot: Yoshino's death brings forth a massive number of new Dolls known as Bitto for Kariya. Day breaks and Urahara casts a barrier around Urahara's Shop so that Ichigo and the others remain undetected by the Bounts...

episodes.title: Hitsugaya ugoku! Osowareta machi
episodes.plot: Several days after Yoshino's death, Kariya's new dolls, the Bitto, begin attacking humans and accumulating souls. The Soul Society also has secretly dispatched a force to the World of the Living, but they are ineffective...

episodes.title: Ichigo VS Daruku! Shiroki yami no shutsugen
episodes.plot: Renji's soul disappears after he is attacked by the Bitto. Ichigo, Rukia, Orihime, and Chad desperately search the town for Renji...

episodes.title: Haîro no kage, dôru no himitsu
episodes.plot: Rukia and Orihime are having a difficult time fighting Yoshi. They decide that Kurodo and Orihime will act as decoys to give Rukia time to unleash a powerful kido...

episodes.title: Daikô chîmu bunretsu? Uragitta Rukia
episodes.plot: Squad 3 Lieutenant Izuru Kira, sent by the Soul Society, saves Ichigo and takes over the fight with Doll Dalk...

episodes.title: Namida no shitô! Rukia VS Orihime
episodes.plot: Rukia is possessed by Ritze and obeys Mabashi's orders to attack Orihime. Orihime tries desperately to use her Shunshunrikka powers, but Mabashi draws out Rukia's Soul Reaper powers...

episodes.title: Rangiku mau! Mienai teki o kire
episodes.plot: Chad, Noba and Ururu confront the Bount Sawatari at a park. Just as the battle is about to begin, the Squad 10 Lieutenant, Rangiku Matsumoto, suddenly appears...

episodes.title: Byakuya shôshû! Ugokidasu Gotei jusan-tai
episodes.plot: After a fierce battle, Noba is defeated by Baura's immense power. Ururu and Chad fight on while trying to protect the injured Noba. Just before being swallowed by Baura, Noba musters all his remaining power and moves himself and his allies to another space...

episodes.title: Fuku-taichô zenmetsu!? Chika dôkutsu no wana
episodes.plot: Rukia, Chad, Orihime, Noba, and Kurodo return to Urahara's Shop. While getting medical treatment, they discuss how the Bounts are fighting with more power than ever...

episodes.title: Saisen!? Ishida VS Nemu
episodes.plot: Ichigo, Renji, Rukia, Chad, Orihime, and the others enter the cave of the Bounts. As they cautiously proceed, the eyes of the Doll Gesell suddenly appear...

episodes.title: Abarai Renji, tamashî no bankai
episodes.plot: Near the end of Gesell's labyrinth, the Doll Gesell reveals her true form to Ichigo and Renji. Ichigo stands ready with his zangetsu, but Renji steps forward and insists on taking her on solo...

episodes.title: Shinigami to kuinshî, yomigaeru chikara
episodes.plot: When Jin Kariya reveals that the true mission of the Bounts is to destroy the Soul Society, Ichigo is shocked. Bounts are by-products of the Soul Society's soul experiments...

episodes.title: Sunshin Yoruichi, mau!
episodes.plot: Orihime decides that the quickest way to get to Rukia is for she and Ishida to disguise themselves as Shinigami.

episodes.title: Hiretsuna Shinigami
episodes.plot: Orihime and Ishida, dressed as Shinigami, are offered help by Squad 12, but Ishida quickly realizes that the jig is up and the offer is a trap.

episodes.title: Ishida, kyokugen no chikara!
episodes.plot: Captain Kurotsushi decides that rather than kill Ishida, he wishes to capture him and study his distinctive Quincy abilities.

episodes.title: Genkai o koero!
episodes.plot: Yoruichi trains Ichigo in the finer points of using his zanpaku-to...

episodes.title: Jitsuroku! Shinigami no gakkô
episodes.plot: Hinamori recalls her days at the Shinigami Academy (Shin'ôreijutsin), where she met and trained in the World of the Living.

episodes.title: Adautsu monotachi
episodes.plot: Hinamori, Renji and Kira have all escaped.

episodes.title: Hitsugaya, hoeru
episodes.plot: In her holding cell, Rukia has a dream that she believes is to help her prepare for the next day's events.

episodes.title: Rukia no akumu
episodes.plot: In her dream, Rukia recalls her time spent training under Lieutenant Kaien and Captain Ukitate.

episodes.title: Yomigaeru shishi
episodes.plot: In the world of the living, Don Kanonji tries to up the ratings of his television show by recruiting Kon as the mascot of his show.

episodes.title: Shokei no asa
episodes.plot: Preparations are underway for Rukia's execution...

episodes.title: Renji, tamashî no chikai! Byakuya to no shitô
episodes.plot: While Renji is going to save Rukia from her execution, he encounters Byakuya who is trying make the execution happens at any cost.

episodes.title: Ichimaru Gin no yûwaku, kuzusareta kakugo
episodes.plot: As Rukia Kuchiki is being lead to her execution, she is stopped by the ever-devious Gin Ichimaru. Just when Rukia has prepared herself for death, her concentration is broken by Gin's offer to let her live..

episodes.title: Hatasareru chikai! Rukia dakkan naruka!
episodes.plot: Rukia's execution begins as Ichigo and the others are rushing to Sookyoku Hill in an attempt to stop the ceremony.

episodes.title: Saikyô no Shinigami! Kyûkyoku no shitei taiketsu
episodes.plot: While Renji hurries to get Rukia out of harm's way, Ichigo stays behind to hold off Byakuya Kuchiki.

episodes.title: Chôsoku no tatakai! Bu no megami, kessu
episodes.plot: Captain Ukitake and Captain Kyoraku face the punishment meted out by Head Captain Yamamoto's Zanpakuto.

episodes.title: Senbonzakura, funsai! Ten wo tsuku Zangetsu
episodes.plot: Fueled by anger and feelings of abandonment and betrayal, Soi Fong persists in her attempt to destroy her former master Yoruichi Shihôin, but her abilities may be hampered by her cocksure attitude.

episodes.title: Kaihô! Kuroki yaiba, kiseki no chikara
episodes.plot: The fierce battle between Ichigo and Captain Byakuya rages on. Ichigo taunts Byakuya and demands that he use his Bankai against him...

episodes.title: Shitô ketchaku! Shiroki hokori to kuroki omoi
episodes.plot: Byakuya Kuchiki may have been impressed by the power exerted by Ichigo, the substitute Shinigami, but he's not done fighting yet.

episodes.title: Zetsubô no shinjitsu, furiushiro sareta kyôjin
episodes.plot: Central 46 is the highest judicial body in the Soul Society. After breaking into Central 46, Captain Hitsugaya and Vice-Captain Matsumoto discover that the forty Sages and six Judges were slaughtered days earlier.

episodes.title: Aizen tatsu! Osorubeki yabô
episodes.plot: After defeating Captain Hitsugaya, Captain Aizen heads for the Execution Grounds. Renji is dumbfounded as he finds himself facing Captains Aizen, Ichimaru, and Tôsen at Sokyoku hill.

episodes.title: Shûketsu seyo! Saikyô no Shinigami gundan
episodes.plot: Furious after hearing the news of the defection of three captains, Sajin Komamura arrives at the Sokyoku ready to beat the treachery out of Aizen and his lackeys.

episodes.title: Rukia no ketsui, Ichigo no omoi
episodes.plot: Peace returns as the Soul Society recuperates from the deep wounds left by the treachery of Captain Aizen and his partners in crime. Captain Komamura and Lieutenant Hisagi visit the graves of fallen comrades...
